Delimit.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item.
Delimit.returns: The potentially indented and delimited new text value.

Format.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item and adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.
Format.returns: The potentially indented, delimited and wrapped new text value.

Line.returns: The potentially indented new text value.

Text.returns: The potentially indented new text value.

Wrap.summary: Adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.
Wrap.returns: The potentially wrapped and indented new text value.

GetDelimited.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item.
GetDelimited.returns: The potentially indented and delimited new text value.

GetIndented.summary: Gets a new line with prefixed indent.
GetIndented.returns: The potentially indented new text value.

GetWrapped.summary: Adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.
GetWrapped.param: returns true if new line; otherwise false.
GetWrapped.returns: The potentially wrapped and indented new text value.

Indent.summary: Changes the IndentCount by the supplied value.
